name: Kouryaku Casino Bar
overview: Kouryaku Casino Bar ("Tips Casino Bar") is a gambling simulator for the Super Famicom. It provides various venues in a Vegas-like district of gambling dens, each of which offers the player a different gambling game. These gambling activities include a number of dice and card games: Rummy, craps, slots, roulette, poker, blackjack and video poker (which is played solo, instead of against CPU opponents). Players try to win big at each of these events before moving onto the large casino in the middle. The player can also select between a male or female avatar.
